title: 89/165/EEC: Commission Decision of 22 February 1989 recognizing that the United Kingdom applies to heat- treated milk intended for direct home consumption the microbiological standards laid down for step 2 in Directive 85/397/EEC
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 22 February 1989
recognizing that the United Kingdom applies to heat-treated milk intended for direct home consumption the microbiological standards laid down for step 2 in Directive 85/397/EEC
(89/165/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: From 1 January 1989 the United Kingdom applies to heat-treated milk intended for direct home consumption the microbiological standards laid down for step 2 in Directive 85/397/EEC.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 February 1989.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
